extension.summary: High quality walking, climbing and mountain action from the British Mountaineering Council
extension.description: BMC TV is an online video channel designed to complement Summit magazine, our website and our growing social media. Partly funded by Sport England, the idea is to bring together exciting walking, climbing and mountain content, mix it up with essential skills and safety advice and promote it across all our social media channels. This is a new platform, which hosts our video content, and is optimised for all devices, such as desktops, tablets and phones.
